TopicTitle: Space Shuttle launching a moose satellite... antlers included

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

Testing a Space Shuttle with a small, useless and stupid payload. Made it back to the runway too.

This weird logo with the moose dates back from english class when I was in engineering school... those were good times ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gaPL-uqsoNM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

A few quick shots:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/0CkrE)

Enjoy ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Snaky Le Vrai
